headline.main: NAZIS ARE ON ALERT FOR 'SECOND FRONT'; Attempted Invasion Said to Be Expected by Both Germans and French on Coast FOE REINFORCES DEFENSE Importance Attached to How Much Laval Can Influence Attitude of France

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, July 1 -No reaction is obtainable tonight from private circles in France to the second notification broadcast from London to the populations along the coast that developments are impending. But certainly it has not come as a surprise.
abstract: Laval followers expect him to control French pub in event of Allied invasion; cite control of coercive organs, including police and gendarmerie
